about_the_game:
You wake up on an unknown hill with the most beautiful woman standing over you.
Before you can speak, she informs you that you’re on Mount Olympus… Oh! And you’re dead.
As the newest god, it’s time for you to party! Attending galas and keggers, you find yourself surrounded by hotties of all kinds, but you can’t shake the rumors about your appearance. Will you discover the strange secrets of this world?



Who’s on this mountain anyway? Meet the sexy singles that inhabit Olympus!


  • Eris!
    Follow the explosion noises and you’ll find them! This firecracker is fiending for love!

  • Heracles!
    Such a hunk from his head down to his lion skins! What secrets lie below the surface of this laborious fellow?

  • Hecate!
    This witch is sure to cast a spell on you! This three-bodied minx will certainly have the key to your heart!

  • Hebe!
    She’s young, vibrant, bashful, and divorced. Do you have what it takes to make her blossom?

  • Delphin!
    You might cast a wide net, but this dapper gentleman has eyes only for you!

  • Thanatos
    A jaded avatar of death, this man is looking for someone to liven up his life!



  • Easy to Pick Up and Play
    This game is as easy as one click! No need to learn complicated mechanics or massive rule sheets, this game is as easy as click, click, fall in love!

  • Narrative-Based!
    The characters and story of “Oh No! I Died and Became an Olympian!” unfurls naturally, with many paths to go down. Despite its multiple endings, this game tells a clear story, so no need to worry about confusing cliffhangers!

  • Feel Good Story
    Need a little pick-me-up? This is just the game for you! The world of the Pantheon Harem series is safe and welcoming. No need to worry about the pains on Earth when you’re galavanting through the heavens!

  • Gorgeous Art!
    What’s dating without a little eye candy? All characters and backgrounds were lovingly created by Bixie Boots, whose unique style shines in every interaction.

  • Lovely Characters
    With many choices for your sweetheart, you are sure to find the one cutie who sets your heart on fire! Whether you like jocks, witches, emos, or even a dolphin… this is the game for you! But be warned, these gods are more complicated than they seem!

  • Freedom!
    Gender? Sexuality? These are IMMORTALS, baby! Date whoever you like, regardless of gender or sexuality!

content_descriptors.notes: This is a flirting-based game in the afterlife! There are mentions of death, kissing, and suggestive flirting, but no explicit sex or drug use. You will drink a little wine though!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS: Windows 10(64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7500
  • Graphics: Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible sound card

dejus.descriptors:
Linguagem imprópria
Drogas lícitas
Conteúdo sexual

short_description: Oh No! You died and were reborn as a god on Mount Olympus! Your goal is to find a way back to Earth! The problem? Gods keep falling in love with you! Go on dates, party through the night, and find out what’s happening on this crazy mountain!
